text: The product quality has improved significantly in the latest version. Really impressed with the performance.
I've been waiting 3 weeks for my order and still no tracking information. This is unacceptable!
Your customer support team was incredibly helpful. They resolved my issue in under 10 minutes.
The pricing is too high compared to competitors. Can you offer any discounts for annual subscriptions?
The app crashes every time I try to export data. This is a critical bug that needs immediate attention.
Love the new dashboard feature! It would be even better if we could customize the widgets.
I've been a customer for 5 years and the service has gone downhill. Considering switching providers.
The onboarding process was smooth, but the documentation could be more detailed for advanced features.
Unable to connect the API to our existing systems. The documentation is outdated and missing key endpoints.
Your product is exactly what we needed. It has already saved our team hours of manual work each week.
The mobile app is slow and unresponsive. Please optimize for better performance on older devices.
Great product overall, but the search functionality needs improvement. It rarely returns relevant results.
We need a feature to bulk import users from CSV files. This is a dealbreaker for enterprise adoption.
The billing system charged me twice this month. I need an immediate refund and explanation.
Excellent integration with Slack and Microsoft Teams. Makes our workflow much more efficient.
The security audit revealed several concerns with data encryption. We need this addressed before renewal.
Training was comprehensive and well-organized. Our team was productive within the first week.
The report generation feature is broken â€” produces blank PDFs. Already reported this twice.
Middling experience. Some features work well, others feel half-baked. The potential is there but needs polish.
Need better role-based access controls. Currently, all users have the same permissions which is a compliance issue.
